net.cloud.server.entity.player.save

Class PlayerSaveHandler.PlayerSaveRequestHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.cloud.server.entity.player.save.PlayerSaveHandler.PlayerSaveRequestHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FileRequestListener<FileOutputStream>
    Enclosing class:
    PlayerSaveHandler

    private static class PlayerSaveHandler.PlayerSaveRequestHandler
extends Object
implements FileRequestListener<FileOutputStream>
    A FileRequestListener which will write to the player's data file when the file is ready. This is so that the FileServer thread(s) handle the load rather than the calling thread. If an exception occurs and writing is not completed, the exception will be logged with a message stating which player's data was not saved.

    • Method Detail

      • requestReady

        public void requestReady(FileOutputStream file)
        Called when the player's data file is ready for output. The contents of the byte buffer will be written to the file, and the file will be closed.
        Specified by:
        requestReady in interface FileRequestListener<FileOutputStream>
        Parameters:
        file - The player's data file

      • requestException

        public void requestException(FileRequestException ex)
        Logs the exception, and includes the name of the player whose data could not be saved.
        Specified by:
        requestException in interface FileRequestListener<FileOutputStream>
        Parameters:
        ex - The exception resulting from the handling of the request this listener is attached to
